reviewText: Great movie! Item as described! Great service!

Thugs, hooligans and dangerous killers. An incredible piece of history, it's incredible that Hitler's hunger for power was shared by those closest to him to the point of a murderous frenzy that took place over a period of 48 hours and involved possibly 1,000 lives.
